channel.title: Question with alching
channel.description: on most servers, when u high alch, u choose it then slect the item, and then it brings you back to the mage screen. on mine, after u alch it stays on the invo slot. how do i change?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 12:02:50 PM[/size][hr]/??

item.title: Question with alching
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

kupo:

Theres a tut, I have it added in my server its 1 step I’ll find it.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 04:39:30 PM[/size][hr]Ok, in your alch part for the magic instead of showInterface put setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);

setsidebarinterface is wrong… setsidebarinterface is what it shows when you click on that sidebar tab… so if you made it setsidebarinterface(6, 12855); that would make it show the ancients when you did that spell…

Read full topic

item.title: Question with alching
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

i do have a rigged version for you… but its probably not what you want…

search

else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch

and after

newAnimRequired = true;

add this…

showInterface(1151);

that makes the normal magic interface appear in the top left cornor of your screen… after every alch…

also you might want to add this…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("clear")){ RemoveAllWindows(); sendMessage("your screen is now clear of all windows..."); }

metal

Read full topic
